text: 100-ball cricket is a short form of cricket. The 100 ball game has two teams each having one innings, which ends after 100 legal balls (deliveries), and the game ends in two and a half hours. Overs are done with 5 or 10 balls, rather than 6 balls. The England Cricket Board is starting a 100-ball competition named The Hundred in 2021. == Related pages == * T20 cricket, which has 120-ball innings == References == Category:Minor forms of cricket
title: 100-ball cricket
